messages.title: Biggest Crime Survey Ever
messages.content: The recent crime survey undertaken by Terry Scriven and the Lib Dems is the largest ever undertaken in the New Forest with 40,000 copies distributed.

messages.title: Another threat to Dibden Bay
messages.content: Terry and local Lib Dem King are at the forefront of the battle to lessen the impact Dibden Bay by improved consultation and planning.

messages.title: Terry gets his teeth into dental problem
messages.content: Terry Scriven has asked Natalie Jones of the Hampshire Primary Care Trust for an explanation. The New Forest dental campaign is still waiting for an improvement.

messages.title: Verging on the ridiculous
messages.content: Liberal Democrat Councillor David Harrison and prospective MP, Terry Scriven are calling upon Hampshire County Council to protect grass verges.

messages.title: Another grant for a good cause
messages.content: The two County Councillors for Totton have used a part of their devolved grant budgets to give the local Royal British Legion branch £2000 towards refurbishment and building improvements at their hall.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The message is getting through. Terry Scriven and the Lib Dems can win in the New Forest East Parliamentary seat for the first time.

issues.environment: Terry and local Lib Dem King are at the forefront of the battle to lessen the impact on Dibden Bay through improved consultation and planning.
issues.governance: Natalie Jones of the Hampshire Primary Care Trust for an explanation.
issues.health: Terry Scriven has asked Natalie Jones of the Hampshire Primary Care Trust for an explanation. The New Forest dental campaign is still waiting for an improvement.

contactInformation.address: Return to: Terry Scriven, New Forest Lib Dems, FREEPOST SO3036, Hythe SO45 5JA
